verses.chords: C         G          D       Em       @C            G         D    Em     @    C        G            D            Em       @C         G                D       G
verses.lyrics: The sun comes up, it's a new day dawning  @It's time to sing Your song again  @Whatever may pass and whatever lies be-fore me  @Let me be singing when the evening comes

verses.chords: C       G               D       Em     @     C       G              D        Em    @    C        G               D       Em       @C            G              D        G
verses.lyrics: You're rich in love and You're slow to anger  @Your name is great and Your heart is kind  @For all Your goodness I will keep on singing  @Ten thousand reasons for my heart to find

verses.chords: C       G           D           Em       @    C         G           D        Em    @C        G                   C      Em        @C            G                 D   G
verses.lyrics: And on that day when my strength is failing  @The end draws near and my time has come  @Still my soul will sing Your praise unending  @Ten thousand years and then forevermore

choruses.chords: D         C         G     D    Em    @C           G    D     @          C        Em    C  D  Em    @     C            D    Gsus4  G
choruses.lyrics: Bless the Lord O my soul, O my soul  @Worship His Holy name  @Sing like never be-fore, O  my soul  @I'll worship your Holy name
